articles.title: Die Oumuamua-Überraschungen
articles.image_title: HANDOUT - Caption: An artist's depiction of the interstellar comet 'Oumuamua, as it warmed up in its approach to the sun and outgassed hydrogen (white mist), which slightly altered its orbit.
